chart.title: Democracy index
chart.subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by the [Economist Intelligence Unit (2006-2023)](#dod:economist-intelligence-unit). It combines information on the extent to which citizens can choose their political leaders in free and fair elections, enjoy civil liberties, prefer democracy over other political systems, can and do participate in politics, and have a functioning government that acts on their behalf. It ranges from 0 to 10 (most democratic).

Democracy score.descriptionShort: Extent to which citizens can choose their political leaders in free and fair elections, enjoy civil liberties, prefer democracy over other political systems, can and do participate in politics, and have a functioning government that acts on their behalf. It ranges from 0 to 10 (most democratic).
Democracy score.descriptionProcessing: Values for continents have been obtained by averaging the values of the countries in the continent.
